meanings.sent1: The mispoised vase fell off the table.
meanings.sent2: The mispoised painting hung crooked on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mispoised bookshelf looked like it was doing a dance.
meanings.sent4: Her mispoised thoughts were scattered like leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The mispoised chair teetered dangerously on one leg.

meanings.sent1: She felt mispoised and awkward in the unfamiliar setting.
meanings.sent2: His mispoised speech made it hard for others to understand him.
meanings.sent3: The mispoised actor tripped over his own feet during the play.
meanings.sent4: The mispoised melody of the song left the audience confused.
meanings.sent5: The mispoised puzzle pieces didn't fit together properly.
